=== Ubuntu Women Team ===
* By popular vote, launched second, logged IRC Channel for project discussions: #ubuntu-women-project
* <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Interviews|Interviews Series]]</nowiki> for Full Circle Magazine published <nowiki>[[http://fullcirclemagazine.org/issue-34/|Issue 34]]</nowiki> with interview of Melissa Draper
* Started <nowiki>[[https://lists.ubuntu.com/archives/ubuntu-women/2010-February/002530.html|International Women's Day Competition "How I discovered Ubuntu" Voting]]</nowiki>
* Team meeting on <nowiki>[[http://wiki.ubuntu-women.org/Meetings/20100216|February 15]]</nowiki>
